name: PDFStandardType

properties.name: NONE
properties.description: The document does not use the PDF/X standard.

properties.name: PDFX1A2001
properties.description: PDF/X-1a standard, which requires all fonts to be embedded, the appropriate PDF bounding boxes to be specified, and color to appear as CMYK, spot colors, or both; can be opened in Acrobat 4.0 and Acrobat Reader 4.0 and later.

properties.name: PDFX1A2003
properties.description: PDF/X-1a standard, which requires all fonts to be embedded, the appropriate PDF bounding boxes to be specified, and color to appear as CMYK, spot colors, or both; can be opened in Acrobat 4.0 and Acrobat Reader 4.0 and later.

properties.name: PDFX32002
properties.description: PDF/X-3 standard, which requires all fonts to be embedded and the appropriate PDF bounding boxes to be specified, and for color allows either the use of color management and device-independent color (CIE L*a*b, ICC-based color spaces, CalRGB, and CalGray) or CMYK, spot colors, or both; can be opened in Acrobat 4.0 and Acrobat Reader 4.0 and later.

properties.name: PDFX32003
properties.description: PDF/X-3 standard, which requires all fonts to be embedded and the appropriate PDF bounding boxes to be specified, and for color allows either the use of color management and device-independent color (CIE L*a*b, ICC-based color spaces, CalRGB, and CalGray) or CMYK, spot colors, or both; can be opened in Acrobat 4.0 and Acrobat Reader 4.0 and later.

properties.name: PDFX42008
properties.description: PDF/X-4 standard, which requires all fonts to be embedded and the appropriate PDF bounding boxes to be specified, and for color allows either the use of color management and device-independent color (CIE L*a*b, ICC-based color spaces, CalRGB, and CalGray) or CMYK, spot colors, or both; can be opened in Acrobat 8.0 and Acrobat Reader 8.0 and later.

description: The PDF/X standard with which the document complies.
longdesc: PDF/X compliant files must contain information describing the printing condition for which they are prepared.
